summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.0°C) and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3950 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1795 m), light levels (up 9543 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 855.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
